description: Adults who reported stronger parental guidance during ages 0-12 have higher current self-love scores.
estimand: Difference in mean self-love scale between top and bottom terciles of parental guidance score.
exposure_variable: during ages *0-12*: Your parents gave useful guidance (pqo6jmj)
notes: Requires scale construction from Likert responses; will document binning logic.

description: Respondents exposed to purity culture before age 12 are more likely to currently prefer strict monogamy.
estimand: Average marginal effect of purity-culture exposure on probability of selecting strictly monogamous preference.
exposure_variable: during ages *0-12*:  taught a purity culture that encouraged abstinance/waiting until marriage (wgbq7hv)
notes: Need to harmonize outcome categories (monogamy variable) into binary indicator.

description: Higher perceived childhood class status predicts higher adulthood net-worth brackets.
estimand: Ordered-logit slope of adult net-worth category on childhood class levels.
outcome_variable: Your CURRENT net worth is closest to (nhoz8ia)
exposure_variable: When you were a child (0-12 years old), your family was (hxyr6oa)
notes: Will treat both variables as ordered categorical; consider collapsing sparse categories.

description: Teens who experienced parental emotional abuse report higher adult anxiety frequencies.
estimand: Difference in average anxiety score between respondents reporting vs. not reporting abuse ages 13-18.
outcome_variable: I tend to suffer from anxiety (npvfh98)-neg
exposure_variable: during ages *13-18*: your parents verbally or emotionally abused you (v1k988q)
notes: Investigate whether anxiety scale is coded so higher means more anxiety (neg-coded).
